languages.text: "Кто знает. Одна мысль об этом заставляет сердце пропустить удар. Если кто-то попытается хирургическим путем избавиться от Атласа, то сразу же погибнет, как только тот отделится от плоти. Если же уничтожить эльдарский кристалл на сем мире... полагаю, немногие переживут столь мощное потрясение".

traits.locale_text: "Кто знает. Одна мысль об этом заставляет сердце пропустить удар. Если кто-то попытается хирургическим путем избавиться от Атласа, то сразу же погибнет, как только тот отделится от плоти. Если же уничтожить эльдарский кристалл на сем мире... полагаю, не многие переживут столь мощное потрясение".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate demise the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I assume few would survive such an ordeal."
languages.original_text: "Кто знает. Одна мысль об этом заставляет сердце пропустить удар. Если кто-то попытается хирургическим путем избавиться от Атласа, то сразу же погибнет, как только тот отделится от плоти. Если же уничтожить эльдарский кристалл на сем мире... полагаю, немногие переживут столь мощное потрясение".

traits.locale_text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate death the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I would say that few would survive such an ordeal."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate death the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I would say that few would survive such an ordeal."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate demise the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I would say that few would survive such an ordeal."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate demise the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I would say that few would survive such an ordeal."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate demise the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I assume few would survive such an ordeal."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate demise the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I assume few would survive such an ordeal."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「誰にも分かりません。単純に考えれば、心臓は止まります。アトラスを航宙士の身体から外科的に除こうとすれば、肉体と分離した瞬間に死亡するでしょう。この星でアエルダリのクリスタルを壊せば…そんな試練から生還できるものは、ほとんどいないと思います」
languages.original_text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate demise the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I assume few would survive such an ordeal."

traits.locale_text: 「誰にも分かりません。単純に考えれば、心臓は止まります。アトラスを航宙士の身体から外科的に除こうとすれば、肉体と分離した瞬間に死亡するでしょう。この星でアエルダリのクリスタルを壊せば…そんな試練から生還できるものはほとんどいないと思います」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “谁能说得清呢？光是想想这件事情，我就感觉心脏要停下来了。如果打算通过手术，将圣仪从导航者体内取出来，只要圣仪离开肉体的那一刻，导航者就会立刻死亡。如果我们摧毁这个世界中所有的灵族水晶……我猜恐怕没几个人能活下来。”
languages.original_text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate demise the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I assume few would survive such an ordeal."

traits.locale_text: “谁能说得清呢？光是想想这件事情，我就感觉心脏要停下来了。如果打算通过手术，将圣仪从导航者体内取出来，只要圣仪离开肉体的那一刻，导航者就会立刻死亡。如果我们摧毁这个世界中所有的灵族水晶……我敢说，恐怕没几个人能活下来。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Qui saurait le dire ? J'ai mal au cœur rien que d'y penser. Aucun navigateur n'a survécu à l'extraction chirurgicale de son Atlas. Et si nous devions détruire le cristal aeldari de ce monde... J'imagine que pour beaucoup, l'expérience sera fatale. »
languages.original_text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate demise the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I assume few would survive such an ordeal."

traits.locale_text: « Qui saurait le dire ? J'ai mal au cœur rien que d'y penser. Aucun navigateur n'a survécu à l'extraction chirurgicale de son Atlas. Et si nous devions détruire le cristal aeldari de ce monde... J'imagine que pour beaucoup, l'expérience sera fatale. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Quién sabe? La mera idea hace que me dé un vuelco el corazón. Tratar de extirpar quirúrgicamente el Atlas del cuerpo de un Navegante lo matará en cuanto se separe de su piel. Y si destruyéramos el cristal Aeldari de este mundo... no creo que muchos pudieran sobrevivir a las consecuencias».
languages.original_text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate demise the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I assume few would survive such an ordeal."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién sabe? La mera idea hace que me dé un vuelco el corazón. Tratar de extirpar quirúrgicamente el Atlas del cuerpo de un Navegante lo matará en cuanto se separe de su piel. Y si destruyéramos el cristal Aeldari de este mundo... no creo que muchos pudieran sobrevivir a las consecuencias».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wer vermag das schon zu sagen? Beim bloßen Gedanken daran setzt mein Herz einen Schlag aus. Der Versuch, den Atlas chirurgisch aus dem Körper eines Navigators zu entfernen, endet mit dessen sofortigem Tod, sobald er von seinem Fleisch getrennt wird. Und wenn wir den Aeldari-Kristall auf dieser Welt zerstören würden ... Ich nehme an, dass das nur wenige überleben würden."
languages.original_text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate demise the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I assume few would survive such an ordeal."

traits.locale_text: "Wer vermag das schon zu sagen? Beim bloßen Gedanken daran setzt mein Herz einen Schlag aus. Der Versuch, den Atlas chirurgisch aus dem Körper eines Navigators zu entfernen, endet mit dessen sofortigem Tod, sobald er von seinem Fleisch getrennt wird. Und wenn wir den Aeldari-Kristall auf dieser Welt zerstören würden ... Ich würde sagen, dass das nur wenige überleben würden."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Kim bilir... Bunu düşününce bile kalbim pıt pıt atıyor. Bir Rotacı'nın vücudundaki Atlas'ı cerrahi işlemle çıkarıp almaya kalkarsak çıkardığımız anda ölüp gider. Dahası, bu dünyadaki Aeldari kristalini yok edersek... Bundan pek fazla kişinin sağ çıkacağını sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Who can say? The mere thought of it makes my heart skip a beat. Attempting to remove the Atlas surgically from a Navigator's body will end in their immediate demise the moment it is separated from their flesh. And if we were to destroy the Aeldari crystal on this world... I assume few would survive such an ordeal."

traits.locale_text: "Kim bilir? Bunu düşününce bile kalbim pıt pıt atıyor. Bir Rotacı'nın vücudundaki Atlas'ı cerrahi bir işlemle çıkarıp almaya çalışırsak, çıkardığımız anda ölmelerine sebep olur. Dahası, bu dünyadaki Aeldari kristalini yok edersek... Bundan pek fazla kişinin sağ çıkacağını sanmıyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
